name: t10_math_libm
description: Math-heavy module requiring -lm linkage. Uses sin, cos, sqrt, pow, log, exp, floor, ceil. Tests the builder's link-flag allowlist and libm dependency handling.
oracle_pressure: Floating-point operations may be replaced with SSE/AVX intrinsics at O2+. Oracle must handle DW_TAG_base_type for 'double' vs register-based representations, and recognize that libm calls may be inlined by the compiler at higher O-levels.
